title: Blanke ark
overview: Blanke ark was a Norwegian reality documentary series.The first season of the series followed eight ninth grade youths who did not find their place in the school system, and were in expectation of school development in relation to curricula. During six weeks, they received adapted training with teacher Håvard Tjora, who was then a teacher at Tåsen School in Oslo.The second season was about a group of students who had dropped out of high school. Håvard Tjora would try to get them back to school through a five-week intensive team game, packed with mastering training, alternative pedagogy and good experiences.
